FuncDef: This command resets the most recent peak counter.

ParaDef.Info: Clears IOM host peak value statistics for the specified IOM.
Clears MDA host peak value statistics for the specified MDA.
Clears port host peak value statistics for the specified port ID.
Clears pseudowire port host peak value statistics for the specified port. Values-1 to 10239.
Clears system host peak value statistics.
Clears all host peak value statistics.
Resets the sub-level counters. For example, clearing IOM counters with the recursive keyword also clears counters of all ports counters on that IOM.
